org.epics.ca.util
Class GrowingCircularBuffer<T>

java.lang.Object
  org.epics.ca.util.GrowingCircularBuffer<T>

public final class GrowingCircularBuffer<T>
extends java.lang.Object

Implementaton of circular FIFO unbouded buffer. Instance is not a bit synchronized.

Version:
$Id$
Author:
Matej Sekoranja
